data.title: Senior Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using React.js
Collaborate with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
qualifications: 5+ years experience with React and TypeScript
Strong proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript
Experience with Redux or similar state management libraries
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

data.title: Financial Analyst
responsibilities: Prepare financial reports and forecasting models
Analyze market trends and investment opportunities
Collaborate with accounting team on budget preparation
Present findings to senior management
qualifications: 3+ years experience in financial analysis
Strong Excel and financial modeling skills
CFA or similar certification preferred
Degree in Finance, Economics, or related field

data.title: UX Designer
responsibilities: Design intuitive user interfaces for healthcare applications
Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Collaborate with development team on implementation
qualifications: 4+ years experience in UX/UI design
Portfolio demonstrating healthcare or complex system designs
Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Understanding of accessibility standards

data.title: Backend Developer Intern
responsibilities: Assist in developing and maintaining backend services
Write clean, maintainable code following best practices
Participate in code reviews and team meetings
Debug and fix issues reported by QA team
qualifications: Currently pursuing Computer Science degree
Basic knowledge of Node.js and Python
Understanding of RESTful APIs
Familiarity with databases (SQL or NoSQL)

data.title: Marketing Specialist
responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns
Manage social media channels and content calendar
Analyze campaign performance and optimize strategies
Coordinate with influencers and brand ambassadors
qualifications: 2+ years experience in digital marketing
Experience with social media advertising platforms
Fluent in German and English
Basic knowledge of SEO and Google Analytics
